quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Days and Lives
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, wedding, murder. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which Days of Our Lives characters were caught between the killer and the tiger at one point?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cyleste and Lexi

questions.question: What Days of Our Lives character died on their own wedding day?
What Days of Our Lives character choked on their own doughnut?
Who held the presumptive murder weapon when Days of Our Lives character Cassie Brady was found dead?
Which of these Days of Our Lives characters locked the cage at the circus so the killer could not get in?
Who was the first person to find Jack dead in the TV series Days of Our Lives?
Who was the Salem Stalker on the TV show Days of Our Lives?
On the TV show Days of Our Lives, Kates wedding dress was covered in blood and she let out a horrible scream.
Which of these Days of Our Lives characters was the first to die?
How did Tony die on the TV show Days of Our Lives?

options.text: He was stabbed with a sword.
He was ravaged by a tiger.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was poisoned at hospital.

questions.question: Which of the following did Days of Our Lives character Maggie do?

options.text: She let the killer in her own house

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She let the killer in her own house

questions.question: On the TV show Days of Our Lives, which of these characters that were in the cage got rid of the killer by blowing fire in his face?
On what day did Days of Our Lives character Cassie Brady die?
Which of these characters were locked in the cage on the TV show Days of Our Lives?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kate, Sami, Bonnie, Mimi, Julie

questions.question: Where did Days of Our Lives character Caroline Brady die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: at church

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Country and Title
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, chronicle, coin. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Two Sides of the Coin is the translation of a the title of a soap opera from which country?
Which of these characters wants to kill Jedi master Mace Windu?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boba fett

questions.question: Complete the name of this popular Star Wars character:
Life in the Middle of the City is the translation of the title a soap opera from which country?
What was the name of the clone trooper captain CC-7567, who served under Anakin Skywalker?
Hotel Victory is the translation of the title of a soap opera from this country.
Roofs of Glass is the translation of the title of a soap opera from which country?
Secrets of Heaven is the translation of the title of a soap opera from which country?
Lessons of Life is the translation of the title of a soap opera from which country?
What colour is Plo Koons starfighter in the Star Wars universe?
Where does Star Wars character Cody die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: The Department Store is the translation of the title of a soap opera from which country?
Black Chronicle is the translation of the title of a soap opera from which country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bosnia and Herzegovina

questions.question: Whiter Church is the literal translation of the title of a soap opera from which country?
Belindas Shadow is a soap opera from which country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Puerto Rico

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Dollhouse and Doll
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What color is Star Wars character Yoda?
In the TV show Dollhouse, who goes to The Attic?

options.text: Dolls who do a really good job
Anyone who is considered more a liability than an asset

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anyone who is considered more a liability than an asset

questions.question: Of the following dolls in the TV series Dollhouse, which was let out of his or her contract early?
The following actors all appear on Dollhouse at various times (as the characters in parentheses).  Which one of these actors never appeared on the TV show Angel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fran Kranz (Topher Brink)

questions.question: Which of the following Dollhouse characters are in love with each other?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Victor and Sierra

questions.question: How old was popular fictional character Yoda when he died?
In the TV show Dollhouse, when a person becomes a doll, what happens to the persons original personality?

options.text: The original personality is recorded, and then destroyed.
The original personality is still part of the persons psyche, just suppressed.
The original personality is recorded and stored away to be restored to the person at the termination of the contract.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The original personality is recorded and stored away to be restored to the person at the termination of the contract.

questions.question: Of the following Dollhouse characters, which one believes that people have no soul apart from their mental processes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Topher Brink

questions.question: Name the Supreme Chancellor who is the main antagonist in the Star Wars saga.
Of the following Dollhouse characters, which one is not and never was a doll?
Is the name of Yodas species revealed?
In the context of the television show Dollhouse, what exactly is a doll?

options.text: a genetically engineered human being endowed with certain capabilities
a person whose mind has been erased

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a person whose mind has been erased

questions.question: What species is Star Wars character Kit Fisto?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: none of these

questions.question: In the TV show Dollhouse, why does Dr. Saunders not like the way Topher Brink smells?

options.text: He wears a cologne which she doesnt care for.
He doesnt believe in using deodorant.
Its a subconscious mechanism to defend herself against him.
He programmed her not to like him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He programmed her not to like him.

questions.question: In the TV show Dollhouse, when Whiskey discovers that shes a doll, why does she not want her original personality restored?

options.text: Because her former life was so unpleasant
Because her dolls personality would be lost, which would be like dying
Because shes programmed to not want to return to her former self
Because her contracts not up yet

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because her dolls personality would be lost, which would be like dying

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Futurama and Laverne Shirley
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, girlfriends, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What year did the sitcom Laverne  Shirley first hit the airwaves?

questions.question: What was the birth name of the annoying next door neighbor Squiggy on the show Laverne  Shirley?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andrew Squiggmann

questions.question: In the Fall of 1980, the characters of  Laverney  Shirley left Milwaukee and moved to which city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Los Angeles

questions.question: Who performed Making Our Dreams Come True, the theme song of Laverne  Shirley?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cyndi Grecco

questions.question: The creators of Futurama made direct to DVD movies based on the show.
What was the name of Shirleys boyfriend on the show Laverne  Shirley?
What was the name of  Lavernes Italian born father in the ABC series Laverne  Shirley?
In 2008, Comedy Central brought back the show Futurama with brand new episodes.
In the show Futurama, how many years did Fry get sent into the future?
Which actor played Lenny Kosnowski on the sitcom Laverne  Shirley?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael McKean

questions.question: The sitcom Laverne  Shirley was a spinoff of the 70s hit show  Happy Days.
Where did Laverne and Shirley from the self-titled show work?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shotz Brewery

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Gilligans Island and Sitcom

questions.question: How many episodes were there of the TV series Gilligans Island?
